text: The Nothing Man is a 1953 novel by Jim Thompson. ==Plot== War has left Clinton Brown permanently disfigured by a terrible military accident. He works as a rewrite man for Pacific City's Courier newspaper. Brown's wife Ellen returns to Pacific City, ready to do whatever it takes to get Brown back. Even if it means exposing his deepest secret. ==References== Category:1953 American novels Category:Novels by Jim Thompson Category:Novels about alcoholism Category:English-language novels
title: The Nothing Man
